name: Blocky Game
description:
Some blocks are NOT REAL, identify them and replace them fast before the whole map collapses.

3 difficulty settings

10 levels + bonus level

I added 4 new levels for a total of 15 blocky levels!

Tutorial: Navigate with the cursor to find the yellow blocks, left click to replace them. In the menu screen there's an option 'Difficulty' select the difficulty by pressing one of the 3 bordered blocks, they will light up yellow and the light indicator will also adjust to the selected difficulty.
